net.sf.mmm.search.base

Class AbstractSearchEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractLoggableObject
      • net.sf.mmm.search.base.AbstractSearchEntry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchEntry, AttributeReadId<Long>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicSearchEntry, SearchHitImpl

    public abstract class AbstractSearchEntry
extends AbstractLoggableObject
implements SearchEntry
    This is the abstract base implementation of the SearchEntry interface.
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
